content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) and a furnace at position(41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position 39.5, -79.5) and a burner inserter (position 41.5, -78.5)

### Coal mine 
No coal mine has been established yet, however the agent has coal in its inventory.

### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 117.5, -30.5), boiler(position 111.5, -32.0) and offshore pump (position 106.5, -32.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory has been established yet.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to insert coal into entities
-  Make sure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into entities.
-  Ensure the entity you are trying to insert coal into is not already full.

### Errors when trying to harvest resources
-  Make sure you are within reach of the resource you are trying to harvest.
-  Ensure there are resources available to harvest at your current position.

### Errors when getting entities
-  Make sure the entity you are trying to get exists at the specified position.
-  Ensure the entity you are trying to get is of the correct type.

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  -  `coal`: The amount of coal in the agent's inventory.
  -  `furnace`: The furnace entity at position (41.0, -80.0) and (60.0, -60.0).
  -  `drill`: The burner mining drill entity at position (41.0, -82.0).
  -  `inserter`: The burner inserter entities at positions (39.5, -79.5) and (41.5, -78.5).
  -  `boiler`: The boiler entity at position (111.5, -32.0).
  -  `steam_engine`: The steam engine entity at position (117.5, -30.5).
  -  `offshore_pump`: The offshore pump entity at position (106.5, -32.5).
